channel.title: How can i join a private server on a mac?
channel.description: ok im the same dude who said not to join private scapes, but my rs account got perm banned because i was using a macro i was testing..im sorry mopar and the other users. i just want to know..how can i play private servers on a mac other then infernoscape and escapescape* *escapescape is now dead R.I.P.* i just need help guys, the other day i was drunk and pissed off(yes im 14 and i drink and smoke) im sorry for every1 i judged, i just need help getting on other servers on a mac

item.title: How can i join a private server on a mac?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I hope he does die… hes a complete noobs who thinks you can go to prison for 5 years for playing on private servers… and he thinks we hack people (some do … and what?) and he also thinks you cant hack a mac… i dont know who would want to anyways…

Read full topic
